about_the_game:
So you have beaten the game. Don't go yet! There is much more fun to be had! The "Dead Zone" DLC for Tunguska: The Visitation offers two additional challenge modes: "Nightmare" and "Dead Zone", each with new challenges and many, many new weapons to keep you busy!

You can either start the new modes from scratch, or complete a playthrough and jump into the next difficulty with your earned skills, stats, and gears.

With Nightmare Mode, you will get:

- 8 new weapons (with some in Ravenwood)
- A new heavy armor
- 3 new weapon attachments
- 3 new types of "Elite Mutants" that will be your worst Nightmare
- Tougher and fiercer NPC enemies
- Ability to retain learned skills and some gears from the previous playthrough
- Ability to retain player stats from the previous playthrough
- New fast-travel mechanism to save player time


With Dead Zone Mode, all that you have learned in the Zone will be put to the test. You will get:

- 10 new weapons (with some in Ravenwood)
- A new magical item (in Ravenwood)
- 3 new weapon attachments
- More challenging survival rules
- Ridiculously challenging enemies
- Ability to retain learned skills and some gears from previous playthrough
- Ability to retain player stats from previous playthrough
- Endlessly replay Dead Zone mode after completion and retain skills/stats


Essentially, "Fun with Guns" is the motto for this DLC. It is a must-have for anyone who loves Tunguska and looks to replay the game after completion.
